issue.title: [CI] apache-rat-plugin is not thread-safe warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11148](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11148). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.* ### Original Issue Description: We're getting these warnings in some nightly builds. I don't have the expertise: are they likely to be causing problems now?
